languages.text: {n}Ноги Паскаля подгибаются, но в голосе звучит сталь:{/n} "Очищение начато. Очищение будет завершено. Единица готова к служению. Слава Омниссии!"
{n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ноги Паскаля подгибаются, но в голосе звучит сталь:{/n} "Очищение начато. Очищение будет завершено. Единица готова к служению. Слава Омниссии!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle, but there is steel in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの膝はがくがくと震えているが、その声には鋼鉄の響きがある。{/n}「浄化プロセス開始。プロセスは完了する。ユニットは任務遂行準備完了。万機神を称えよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの膝はがくがくと震えているが、その声には鋼鉄の響きがある。{/n}「浄化プロセス開始。プロセスは完了する。ユニットは任務遂行準備完了。万機神を称えよ！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡跪在了地上，但他的声音像钢铁一样铿锵有力。{/n}“净化程序已初始化，此过程必将完成。本单位已经做好了战斗准备，赞美欧姆尼塞亚！”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡跪在了地上，但他的声音像钢铁一样铿锵有力。{/n}“净化程序已初始化，此过程必将完成。本单位已经做好了战斗准备，赞美欧姆尼塞亚！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las rodillas de Pasqal se doblan, pero en su voz resuena el acero:{/n} «Proceso de limpieza iniciado. El proceso se completará. Esta unidad está lista para servir. ¡Alabado sea el Omnissiah!».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Las rodillas de Pasqal se doblan, pero en su voz resuena el acero:{/n} «Proceso de limpieza iniciado. El proceso se completará. Esta unidad está lista para servir. ¡Alabado sea el Omnissiah!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Knie zittern, doch seine Stimme ist kalt wie Stahl:{/n} "Läuterungsprozess initiiert. Der Prozess wird abgeschlossen werden. Diese Einheit ist bereit zu dienen. Gepriesen sei der Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Knie zittern, doch in seiner Stimme liegt Stahl:{/n} "Läuterungsprozess initiiert. Der Prozess wird abgeschlossen werden. Diese Einheit ist bereit zu dienen. Gepriesen sei der Omnissiah!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vacille, mais sa voix reste inexpressive :{/n} « Processus de purification enclenché. Ce processus sera mené à son terme. Cette unité est prête à servir. Loué soit l'Omnimessie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vacille, mais sa voix reste de marbre :{/n} « Processus de purification enclenché. Ce processus sera mené à son terme. Cette unité est prête à servir. Loué soit l'Omnimessie ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın dizleri çözülse de azmi, sesinden duyuluyor.{/n} "Temizleme işlemi başlatıldı. Bu işlem tamamlanacak. Bu birim hizmete hazırdır. Hermesih'e şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's knees buckle but there is steel ringing in his voice:{/n} "Cleansing process initiated. The process will be completed. This unit is ready to serve. Praise the Omnissiah!"
